posts.post_title: FOR SALE: 1888 Scrapps Diecuts Arlie Latham
posts.post_content:
Hi, I have a Scrapps card FOR SALE.
Glue stains otherwise in decent shape for this delicate issue.
The often missing Mustache tip is OK and card shows a tab on ear where it connected to the sheet around the edge too.

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1888scrappslatham.jpg[/IMG]
SAVED Postage/Insurance Paid


First email gets card
